summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EASY MONEY casino platform. All core features working correctly including demo auth, three games (Mines, Dice, Bubbles), referral system, cashback, wallet with mock payments, and admin panel.
passed_tests: EASY MONEY branding and logo display
All three games (Mines, Dice, Bubbles) functionality
Mines game - start, cell clicking, take winnings
Dice game - chance setting, direction selection, play
Bubbles game - target setting, animation, results
Referral system - link generation and stats
Telegram channel links in header and footer
Admin panel login with correct password
Balance updates after games and payments
